introduction.quote: She is an intellectual witch who can never get enough naps. As the Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, Lisa is smart in that she always knows exactly what to do with whatever troubles her.As much as she loves her sleep, she still manages to keep everything under control in a calm, composed manner.
introduction.content: Lisa Minci is a playable Electro  character in Genshin Impact. A powerful mage recognized as Sumeru Academia's most distinguished graduate in 200 years, Lisa has since returned to Mondstadt to become the humble Librarian of the Knights of Favonius. She can be obtained for free in the Prologue Act I: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind during the quest Sparks Amongst the Pages.

personality.quote: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.
content:
Lisa is a proficient witch; as such, she enjoys everything related to the elements and items that would help her in her understanding in them. Despite her position as Librarian, Lisa takes it somewhat haphazardly as she appears to be relatively bored dealing with the normal books, instead preferring those in the restricted section. She still takes the job seriously nonetheless, as she will personally go out to collect books that are long overdue, albeit in a way that she can still enjoy the smaller things in life.
Her haphazard, carefree personality comes from her Vision, as while the gods gave it to her and she was sated with knowledge she wanted to learn, they did not tell her what the price was, and she began fearing the truth behind them. This in turn caused her to become rather paranoid, and she left Sumeru out of fear that she was paying too high a price for knowledge, relegating herself to categorization and management of the library, usually refusing to take any other duties.
When Lisa becomes angered, the surrounding air near her becomes electrified in part due to her Electro Vision. Depending on the severity of what has angered her, she can either be simply irritated or become incredibly scary, the latter also causing her to dispense "appropriate" punishment.
Lisa seems to be fond of the Traveler and sometimes flirtatious by referring to the Traveler as "cutie" or "darling." Lisa herself says in her Serenitea Pot dialogue that the Traveler is special to her.
She enjoys tea, always ensuring that she has some in the afternoon, along with vegetable soup. She also suffers from cucurbitophobia, the fear of pumpkins.

appearance:
Lisa has fair skin, green eyes, and wavy, light honey-brown hair, which is tied in a loose side ponytail.
She wears a purple and white dress with open slits at the sides and gold embroidery, along with black gloves with pale purple trim, a large witch's hat, black lace stockings, and black high heels, and an earring is visible on one ear. She wears a gold necklace with her Vision clasped to the collar of her dress.
Reflecting her favorite flower, a motif of roses is present throughout her outfit. There is a pale purple rose pinned to her hat, and a similar one on the tie of her ponytail. Additionally, a large ornamental golden rose is attached on her belt at the hip. Her outfit, Purple Rose, is described to be a slim-fit dress adorned with roses that displays a young lady's elegance.

talents.name: Lightning Touch
talents.desc:
Normal Attack: Performs up to 4 Electro attacks, dealing Electro DMG.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to deal Electro DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack: Gathering the might of Electro, Lisa plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals AoE Electro DMG upon impact with the ground.

talents.name: Violet Arc
talents.desc:
Channels the power of lightning to sweep bothersome matters away
Press: Releases a homing lightning orb. On hit, it deals Electro DMG, and applies a stack of the Conductive status (Max 3 stacks) to opponents in a small AoE.
Hold: After an extended casting time, calls down lightning from the heavens, dealing massive Electro DMG to all nearby opponents.
Deals great amounts of extra damage to opponents based on the number of Conductive stacks applied to them and clears their Conductive status.

talents.name: Lightning Rose
talents.desc:
Summons a Lightning Rose that unleashes powerful lightning bolts, launching surrounding opponents and dealing Electro DMG.
The Lightning Rose will continuously emit lightning to knock back opponents and deal Electro DMG for so long as it persists.

talents.name: Induced Aftershock
talents.desc: Hits by Charged Attacks apply Violet Arc's Conductive status to opponents.

talents.name: Static Electricity Field
talents.desc: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

talents.name: General Pharmaceutics
talents.desc: When Lisa crafts a potion, she has a 20% chance to refund one count of one material out of all the crafting materials used.

constellation.name: Infinite Circuit
constellation.effect: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding Violet Arc.A maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellation.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellation.effect:
Holding Violet Arc has the following effects:
Increases DEF by 25%.
Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellation.name: Resonant Thunder
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Lightning Rose by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Plasma Eruption
constellation.effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by Lightning Rose by 1-3.

constellation.name: Electrocute
constellation.effect: Increases the Level of Violet Arc by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellation.name: Pulsating Witch
constellation.effect: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of Violet Arc's Conductive status onto nearby opponents.This effect can only occur once every 5s.
